title: When will the alternate exit from the parking deck located on 2nd Street be repaired?  It\'s been broken for months.   Many people pay monthly parking dues; are these user fees not available to make necessary repairs?  Additionally, the City recently increased free parking time from 60 minutes to 90 minutes; if there isn\'t enough money to make repairs, reducing potential revenue opportunities seems illogical.  Please help.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9549
